tag_list: mcommerce, mobile-commerce, ecommerce, shopping-carts, apps, iphone, ipad, android, html5, apple, ios
overview:
Wladimir is a bilingual entrepreneur whose forward-thinking vision has enabled him to launch and build up two successful companies over the past decade.

He is currently founder & CEO at MobiCart, which he launched on stage in 2010 at the prestigious DEMO Conference in Silicon Valley California.

Wladimir recently secured two rounds of investment for MobiCart totalling just under $1million, which is already powering over 12,000 merchants.

As a pioneer in both the e and m-commerce markets, having previously founded Dpivision Ltd before selling it privately in 2010. Wladimir has been invited as keynote speaker at several international conferences and in April 2012, jetted off to the Russian capital to talk at the Online Retail Russia conference, the biggest of its kind in the country.

Wladimir has presented by request to The Sage Leadership Group (top 100 SAGE representatives), a leading supplier of business management software and services to 6.2 million customers worldwide. An advocate of open standards, Wladimir was included in the SAGE e-commerce benchmark report.

Achievements:

Presented at DEMO in Silicon Valley, Website Magazine Top 50 Mobile Movers & Shakers, Short-listed for the BigChip Awards, Short-listed for .net Magazine Awards, Nominated for the ME top 50 Mobile Innovators, Mentor on the Oxygen Accelerator program, Mentor on the Sunderland Software City program, North East Business Awards Finalist, Plugg European Startup Finalist, North East Digital Awards Winner, Advisor to Business Link on web accessibility

Speaking:

SAGE Leadership Conference, Online Retail Russia, ThinkingDigital Conference, DIBI Conference, Newcastle Entrepreneur Society
